attributes.title: Crashes
attributes.review: This horrible, monstrosity of an app crashed my phone!!! It also stole all of my data, causing me to change my SSN and change my whole identity. 1/5... would rate it a zero if that were an option

attributes.title: DELETED THIS APP
attributes.review: THIS APP GAVE ME NO INFORMATION.  Also when I opened this app it scares my brother half to death. And mad me want to vomit. I keep on see all this that trump believes that men and woman are the same but he never acts like that. I would really appreciate it if you deleted this app. Then I could stop vomiting.

attributes.title: Ooo you are the worst app ever
attributes.review: Ooo you can call me again tomorrow omg omg was your time for you to go out and do it again thank y’all so good night love y’all love ya girl love ya bye ya girl lol omg was a great night I was thinking of going over the weekend to see y’all and I was wondering how much I love y’all so bye bye hi bye bye love you bye bye

attributes.title: Dosnt work
attributes.review: I got this app for our lord and savior Cheeto puff. But it kept crashing and it made my phone die. And it was fully charged. In 2 minutes of opening this app it drained my entire battery. Then my phone exploded. Wouldn’t recommend :(

attributes.title: I am now on the brink of death
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I am a red neck with a 70 IQ who loves to have sexual inter course with my cousin at least three to four times a week. So I thought this would be the perfect app for me. NOPE. It had none of the content I was hoping for. There was no nude trump photos. Waste of a download

attributes.title: Nigerian Prince 🥰🧚🏻‍♂️👑
attributes.review: The trump app would not stop spamming me with tons of propaganda—false propaganda. Every time I receive a text from this app, it feels as if a Nigerian prince is giving me a business proposal. I would not have expected a multi-billionaire to need this much money. Go figure.

attributes.title: Oops how did this get here
attributes.review: This app is soooooo trash it gives not updates, spreads false information and is run by some incompetent loser. 0/10 would not recommend, if I could give it less thank one star I would, absolutely garbage

attributes.title: carole baskin
attributes.review: i wish i fed this app to the tiger instead of my husband tbh🙈it totally would have been a 10/10 idea, because my tiger definitely prefers an orange cheeto over my aged hubby.. oops ex hubby✨😳 and my tiger also doesn’t like good food..my tiger likes GARBAGE👁👄👁...so this app would be a perfect snack🥰mm #FreeCarole xoxo

attributes.title: This app is horrible 🤮🤚🏽
attributes.review: The quality is so trash. Trump has so much money the least he could do is make a good app. Anyways I would ask that we please have it removed because it makes my phone glitch.

attributes.title: Phone keeps crashing!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app a few hours ago and ever since my phone has been glitching and turning off by itself. Would not recommend.
